price: Kuma suka yi mãmãki dõmin Mai gargaɗi, daga cikinsu, ya je musu. Kuma kãfirai sukace, "Wannan mai sihiri ne, maƙaryaci."
arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum waqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā sāḥirun kadhābun
